divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home from concord nh to claremont nh i looked up to see a bright star much bigger than then others in front of me just above the mts. this happened twice on the way home.the funny thing about it was when it drew my attention the light would turn off. it gave me a creepy feeling.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around November 22nd 2008
